description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This factory metapool contains 3Crv (DAI, USDC, and USDT) and Liquity USD, a synthetic USD stablecoin collateralized with Ether.

en.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. es.description: Este token representa un grupo de liquidez de Curve. Los titulares obtienen tarifas de los usuarios que comercian en el grupo y también pueden depositar el LP en los gauges de Curve para obtener emisiones de CRV. Este metapool de fábrica contiene 3Crv (DAI, USDC y USDT) y Liquity USD, una moneda estable USD sintética garantizada con Ether.
